reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These jeans are nice. It's mid-rise and fits great. However, I sure wish it was not a pull-on but a zipper. It takes some time to get it up and down. The size is perfect (I got an 8); however, if I get a size up, the fit will not be good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit pull-on jean that doesn't look like a "mom jean" and no creeping up or down
reviews.reviewText: Literally the BEST jeans I have put on in years. I worry that Lee will discontinue or change this product. Lee Jeans, if by some whim of fate you are actually reading this please don't change this product! I am a cheapskate and I would pay double for these jeans if I had to. Shopko carries a lower quality version for Lee simply called "smoothers". Those are okay, but this "Indigo" line is much nicer.Before I got these jeans, I would not have thought I would ever wear a pull-on jean.OK, the review - Yes, these are pull-on jeans. No, they do not look like "mom jeans". No button to catch your tops or make your tummy look poochier than it is. These pants are perfection. No, I am not a paid reviewer and I did not receive a discount.Fit: For reference, I am in my late 40's, 5'7", in the neighborhood of 143 lbs. I tend toward a smallish waist as compared to my bottom and thighs, but getting a bit fluffy around the middle with a little bit of a pooch. I bought a size 10A. These fit like a dream! They sit just below the natural waist. Therefore, smoothing away my pooch without causing muffin top. They fit smoothly over hips, bottom and thighs without the baggy gap that makes jeans look like mom jeans. But, no creeping up the crack or other unsightly close fit issues. Being someone who is tall-ish, but not tall I often have difficulty with pant length. Very often for me, Average is too short and Tall is way too long. These are perfect length. When I stand barefoot, they cover my entire heel just touching the floor. Also, these do not creep up or down. I'm not constantly pulling them up, nor tugging them down. That is practically unheard of for me.Quality: Denim weight is just right, not too light or too heavy and stiff, fabric is soft. Overall construction is sound, pockets and seams lay nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Fit, Least Favorite Smell
reviews.reviewText: These are my favorite fitting jeans. i've bought 3 pairs so far (went up in sizes) and each one fit exactly as expected. They're super comfortable for jeans, with good stretch. If you're like me and you pull your jeans up by the belt loops, the loops are very sturdy and hold up to lots of pulls. The pockets are a little bigger than most women's jeans pockets so they're actually useful!The one thing that knocks off a star for me is that the Polar Drift dye smells awful and takes several soaks in hot water and vinegar to get the smell and excess dye out. The vinegar and hot water combo is key -- it sets the dye and gets rid of the smell. Let it soak, rinse and repeat a couple times until the water runs clear, then you can wash with detergent like normal. This is normal for a lot of dark wash jeans, but it's still a hassle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfy but low rise
reviews.reviewText: Hits below the muffin top, so any "smoothing" is kind of wasted. Will need to wear a long or loose shirt. Comfy but unfortunately not the "perfect" pair of jeans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: These are the most comfortable jeans. I have 2 pair. The look really cute on . You just pull them on. No zipper or button. The band at the top also holds my tummy in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these jeans!
reviews.reviewText: These are not the Lees of the past! The only thing that would make these jeans better, is if they came with a high waist. I have been scanning Amazon this morning and found other pair that have a high waist. Going to try them. They are not so loose around the waist that they fall down. But also, they are not digging into my waist. I am 5‘4“ tall and weigh 135 pounds. The size 8 fits me perfectly. Also, I love that the pockets sit low on your butt. I just think it makes your butt look better. Smaller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was Extremely reluctant about this purchase!! I waited a day or two before even trying them on but they are a keeper. They feel is good. I would have preferred no pockets on the back but they are okay little low but we can't have it All. I am 5'6" around 130lbs I know I will enjoy these haven't owned a pair of jeans in year, because they would never stay up. These will! Thank Lee Riders!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Description is misleading
reviews.reviewText: These are a perfect straight leg and fit well. If this is what I thought I ordered, I’d give them 5 stars.But it’s not. These are low rise. You will show your underwear in the back when you sit if you aren’t wearing low rise underwear. They sit on your hips.They are also NOT dark blue. They’re just blue and have a faded look on the thighs.If I wanted low rise, regular blue jeans, I’d give these 5 stars.I am keeping them because the legs are perfect at the bottom. Not flared or boot cut or skinny. Just straight.I will wear jackets or long sweaters with these.I would like these in a higher rise, closer to my belly button (these are a good 2 inches lower than my belly button- very early 2000s).

reviews.reviewTitle: I made an awesome mistake in buying these!
reviews.reviewText: I have to admit I was baffled when I took these jeans out of the package. I guess I didn’t read the description. I didn’t realize these were pull on jeans and that the buttons and zipper were fake.My mom wears pull on pants, not me! But since I’ve gained so much weight with this Covid thing and I have absolutely have nothing to wear I decided to try them on. I was surprised! These jeans are super comfy and look really good! The length is perfect for petite. I love these! I’ve recommended them to my sister!I’m glad I made a mistake in when I bought them.

reviews.reviewTitle: love 'em but pockets are non-functionally small ...
reviews.reviewText: I really like the weight of this jean. Does not feel 'cheap' and fits even my largish stomach and butt :-)The only reason I've knocked a star off is because the front pockets are TINY. I wear jeans to do my farm work and often need to carry a hoof pick, etc., when working with my horses. Forget about carrying a cell phone ...
Fit perfectly. Ordered because of size but also belt loops. Elastics on pants do not last, so need loops,Lynda
These are very nice. The fit is perfect and they are a good quality. No need to spend a fortune on a pair of jeans. They are also very comfortable to wear. Bought 2 pairs as was so happy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Straight leg does not mean tight at ankles
reviews.reviewText: The ankle of the pants could be tighter, but I love them I will try to find a lighter colour denim and tighter at ankles.
